Since 2012, GoldenBeaverHosting.com is a web host and VPS provider. Dedicated to price-quality ratio, we provide quality services for those on a low budget. We believe that the web should remain cheap, reliable and accessible to everyones.


4 locations in USA:

Los Angeles
Dallas
Chicago
Miami

Our KVM VPS (Virtual Private Server) hosting are powered by the latest Dual Xeon Processors including fast SSD Storage and LSI Hardware Raid 10 for high performance. Each VPS include 10 Gbps DDoS protection and can be upgraded at any time!.
